A city of seven hills, Rome is the most visited place on earth. No matter where you look, you will find a piece of history at every nook and corner. From the majestic Pantheon, the Roman Forum, museums, Vatican Museums, and trattoria, you can enjoy a number of things while visiting Rome. Enter a city that is filled with ancient ruins like the Colosseum, Renaissance masterpieces in every church, and pasta that'll make you question why you've settled for less. The city, in its true sense, is beautiful, unapologetic, and chaotic. Book your tickets to Rome today and enjoy an unforgettable journey ahead.

When is the Best Time to Fly to Rome?

Though it is said that one can visit Rome anytime, the best time to travel is between October and April. Usually, the weather is mild at this time, and there are fewer tourists crowding the country. We recommend you should book in advance if possible to avoid paying extra for tickets to Rome.

What are the Major Attractions in Rome?

There are plenty of things to explore while visiting Rome, such as its majestic architecture, modern skylines, mouth-watering dishes, and larger-than-life museums. For a much better experience, make sure to stop by these places mentioned below.

  • Colosseum
  • Vatican Museum
  • St. Peter's Basilica
  • Roman Forum
  • Trevi Fountain
  • Pantheon
  • Piazza Navona
  • Piazza del Popolo
  • Galleria Borghese
  • Church of St. Louis of the French
  • Trastevere
  • The Baths of Caracalla
  • Museo Nazionale di Castel Sant'Angelo
  • Palazzo Doria Pamphilj

Major International Airports of Rome

Are you going to Rome but not sure which airport you should fly into? There are two major international airports in Rome connecting the world to this amazing city. Choose any of the two and make your trips count at every step.

  • Fiumicino (FCO) Airport
  • Ciampino (CIA) Airport

How do you book a flight to Rome with Traveloways?

Looking for cheap flights to Rome but stuck with pricey options? Let Traveloways help you find a suitable flight that meets your requirements. Here's the process to be followed;

  • Open the official webpage of Traveloways.
  • Hover over the 'Flight' option.
  • Provide your travel details as asked on the screen.
  • Click the submit button.
  • You will see a list of available flights.
  • Compare and choose the option that suits your requirements.
  • Proceed further to pay and confirm your booking.

Once you are done with the process, you will receive your confirmed ticket in the mail. Keep these documents with you, as they will come in handy while checking in.

Cheap Flight Hacks for Affordable Travel to Rome

With Traveloways, you can find some of the best deals for Rome. However, it is always best to be prepared. Check out the below-mentioned tips for affordable travel to Rome;

  • Be as flexible as possible with your travel dates.
  • Set up flight alerts to monitor flight prices to book cheap tickets.
  • You can use flight comparison tools to track prices and find the best available deals.
  • Avoid flying during peak seasons as ticket prices are quite high compared to other times.
